of the head the hat and head have the same stitches so you can match the row up ❖ tail put the tail around ¼ the way up of the body sew in the base of the tail the part that s open sew the tip of the tail the closed side into the body ❖ ears sew on hat first place on either side of the hat with a row between them hat row ear ❖ arms + legs so sorry that i forgot to write down the exact row anyways sew the arms a little bit above ½ of the body the arms are placed on the side of the body the legs should be placed towards
